content:
There are no Russian warships in the Black and Azov Seas.

About thisreportedNavy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

There are two enemy ships in the Mediterranean, including one carpet carrier carpet, a total volley of up to 8 rockets.

In the interests of the Russian Federation during the day, 14 vessels went to the Kerch Strait, 4 of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait;.

8 vessels were headed to the Black Sea, 3 of them continued the movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait.

"The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (Solas), turning off automatic identification systems (AIS)," the Navy emphasized.

As reported by the Armyinfrom, March 21 after a monthly pause Russiabrought to the Black Seasubmarines with winged missiles.
title: There are no Russian ships in the Black and Azov Seas
description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Mediterranean are ...
author: Army Inform
